channel.title: Need help with little things. [DELTA]
channel.description:
1. My Lunar is working on DeltaScape with my client but, I need Astral Runes to cast Lunar spell. The ID is 553 but it's not Astral runes and doesnt work with Lunar. How can I fix that ?
2. When my server goes offline and I need to do an update, I restart it and right after I restart is, my client disapear at same time. How can I fix this that when I restart my server, my client don't close ?
If I got more questions, I'll post them.
Thanks if you help me.

item.title: Need help with little things. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

  1. My Lunar is working on DeltaScape with my client but, I need Astral Runes to cast Lunar spell. The ID is 553 but it’s not Astral runes and doesnt work with Lunar. How can I fix that ?

  2. When my server goes offline and I need to do an update, I restart it and right after I restart is, my client disapear at same time. How can I fix this that when I restart my server, my client don’t close ?

If I got more questions, I’ll post them.

Thanks if you help me.
